meta.description: Determine the optimal number of small and large bouquets to transport to maximize the total number of flowers.

params.name: flowers_per_bouquet
params.description: Number of flowers per bouquet type

params.name: max_bouquets
params.description: Maximum number of each bouquet type that can be transported

objective.name: max_total_flowers
objective.description: Maximize the total number of flowers transported

constraints.name: max_small_bouquets
constraints.description: Limit on the number of small bouquets

constraints.name: max_large_bouquets
constraints.description: Limit on the number of large bouquets

constraints.name: total_bouquets_limit
constraints.description: Total number of bouquets transported cannot exceed 70

constraints.name: min_large_bouquets
constraints.description: At least 20 large bouquets must be transported

constraints.name: small_bouquets_twice_large
constraints.description: Number of small bouquets must be at least twice the number of large bouquets
